author: parithosh
content: yes exactly, it'll be live until there are more mature and public testnets with the fork implemented

author: builder_benny
content: are there any plans to have a UI on mainnet for any of the EL-triggered actions (like consolidations, partial withdrawals, full exits, etc)? - something like what is available here for consolidations on Mekong (here: https://dora.mekong.ethpandaops.io/validators/submit_consolidations)
